Text.Page:
Why settle for vampirs when we could be having just as much fun with the {@LinkCreature:16#2203#violent dwarves}, eh? They've been attacking anyone who goes near the Twisted Plains.

I know the vampirs are what's on everyone's mind, but the dwarves are also posing quite a threat to Popolion. Try to make a dent in them.
Thank you, <PCNAME>. The villagers may never realize they're safer, but I appreciate the work you've done here.
If we don't send any forces to deal with the dwarves, then we won't need to worry about whether or not the vampirs are coming, cause we'll be dead.
